subject: fix: use container height instead of document height for embed resize
body:
The auto-height postMessage was measuring document.documentElement.scrollHeight
which included elements outside the embed container (#heatmap-tooltip div,
body pseudo-elements), reporting incorrect heights to the parent iframe.

Changes:
- Measure container.scrollHeight instead of document.documentElement.scrollHeight
- Delay initial height post by 100ms to let Chart.js finish first RAF render
- Track lastHeight to skip duplicate postMessage calls
